strapiPost.title: New Exhibition Opening At Scott Family Amazeum
strapiPost.content:
The Scott Family Amazeum will open its exciting new Building Buddies exhibition, which invites children to creatively explore building and construction, this Saturday, May 27, at 12p.

  • As a continuously developing community, this exhibition reflects the NWA landscape with a playful point of view where kids are encouraged to explore a colorful, interactive village and build a better community utilizing play and exploration.
  • Children can construct, build, paint with light, decorate, tile, and more in the multi-sensory environment filled with STEAM learning activities intended to encourage social behaviors such as sharing, cooperating, taking turns, and teamwork.

Building Buddies will run through Sep 2023, and is included with admission. Plan your Amazeum visit HERE.
